events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Manchester United

headlines.description: Goals from Marcus Rashford and Andreas Pereira helped Manchester United to a 3-1 home win over Brighton at Old Trafford on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: United back in top half after beating Brighton

headlines.description: Wolverhampton Wanderers shrugged off their midweek Europa League exertions to comfortably beat Aston Villa 2-1 in Sunday's Midlands derby.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wolves beat Villa to move into top eight

headlines.description: Liverpool's Fabinho, Mohamed Salah and Sadio Mane struck to give the league leaders a 3-1 win over defending champions Manchester City on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool go eight clear amid VAR controversy
